amendment.description: An amendment numbered 96 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds to require universities to enforce COVID-19 vaccine requirements for students and faculty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
